info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 10:41PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima, west central Cochise and Santa Cruz Counties through 1115 PM MST... At 1041 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Patagonia, or 21 miles northeast of Nogales, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sierra Vista, Nogales, Tubac, Rio Rico, Whetstone, Huachuca City, Patagonia, Sonoita, Elgin, Patagonia Lake State Park, Fort Huachuca, Nogales International Airport, Tumacacori, Amado, Canelo, Madera Canyon and Arivaca Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 19 between mile markers 2 and 17, and between mile markers 19 and 31. Route 82 between mile markers 1 and 53. Route 83 between mile markers 8 and 43. Route 90 between mile markers 304 and 319. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
